#summary Description of the server API.
#labels Phase-Design,Featured

= Introduction =

Communication with the poker server happens through a HTTP connection. The client initiates the connection and send a POST request with a XML body. The server responds with some more XML.

= Details =

The following code snippets are examples of normal requests and responses.

==Login==
====Request====
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--CSPoker login request-->
<login>
    <username>guy</username>
</login>
}}}
====Standard Response====
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--CSPoker login response-->
<login>
    <id>-3172786091566172558</id>
</login>
}}}
====Alternative Response====
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--CSPoker login response-->
<login>
    <exception>You must provide a correct username.</exception>
</login>
}}}

==Join Table==
====Request====
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--CSPoker join table request-->
<jointable>
    <id>-3172786091566172558</id>
    <table>default</table>
</jointable>
}}}
====Standard Response====
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--CSPoker join table response-->
<jointable>
    <status>ok</status>
    <players>
        <player>kenzo</player>
        <player>cedric</player>
    </players>
</jointable>
}}}
====Alternative Response====
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--CSPoker join table response (table full)-->
<jointable>
    <exception>The table is full.</exception>
</jointable>
}}}
